author: Marc Hedish
releaseNotes:
v0.6.4.1 — Added per zone Friendly Names.
v0.6.4.4 — Cosmetic upgrades, now using firendly name for zones.
v0.6.4.9 — Added user controls for JSON vs. attribute publishing; Always publish summartText.
v0.6.4.11 — Added rainAlert and WindAlert protection with user thresholds (unit-sensitive, mirrors freeze alert behavior).
v0.6.4.13 — Fixed dynamicPage setting persistence; internal cleanup.
description: Local-first evapotranspiration (ET) and soil-moisture modeling app for Hubitat. Provides professional-grade irrigation intelligence similar to Rachio, Orbit, and Hydrawise, running entirely on-hub.
